author: wsjcom
title: Mitt Romney Faces a Republican Primary in Bid for Senate Seat
text:
WEST VALLEY CITY, Utahâ€”Mitt Romney was forced Saturday into a Republican primary for a U.S. Senate seat in Utah as he looks to restart his political career by replacing long-serving Sen. Orrin Hatch.
Mr. Romney remains the heavy favorite overall to win the Senate seat in November. But if he had won the votes of a majority of the far-right leaning party delegates at the state GOP convention Saturday, he would have bypassed a primary altogether.
...
